name: Medamon
description: Medamon is the Governance Token for Medabots. Build your own Medabots and participate in worldwide tournaments of Medabattles. Use your deck of cards to command your robots in strategic PVP and PVE combats and earn the most exclusive robot parts to build the ultimate Medabot team. Mint your robot pieces and play with them in the Arena! Come and discover the Medabots & Medamon Universe
